ol.li: Make sure ixgbe driver is loaded in compute host. If you are using RHEL 7.2, it will be loaded out of the box. If you are using some other version, make sure IXGBE is loaded.
The script will insert “intel_iommu=on” in the grub menu.
After all pre-condition, steps to execute scripts on director.
You need to have OSP admin privileges.
Access of RC files of under cloud and over cloud.
Which instance should you apply the script to? Instance Name is required.
VM should have one tenant network assigned to it, prior to script execution.
